publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2589.1 Mr Frank McAveety: Legacy from Lottery Funding for Community Sportâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2589) in the name of Margo MacDonald, insert at end "and also tackle poverty and deprivation, improve economic performance, protect the environment and historic heritage and support artistic endeavour, and notes the particular role of community and voluntary organisations in delivering this legacy."
